bio: Natascha Helbig is the Director of Reader Store, Sony’s online store for eBooks. Natascha is in charge for the store’s operations for North America, including all aspects of content processing, merchandising and content acquisition. She has been working in the ereading space since Sony’s launch of its store and Sony Reader in 2006. She is from Hamburg, Germany.
name: Natascha Helbig
title: Director, Reader Store
